The method is also efficient and cost-effective. It involves incorporation of bio-degraders, P-solubilizers, N-fixers and bio-pesticides. Because of these advantages, it is getting popular year after year. Varanashi model of sand and plastic barrage is an innovation slowly getting popular.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Sri Sri Institute of advanced research at Ved Vignan Maha Vidya Peeth has been involved in the research related to spiritual practices introduced by his holiness Sri Sri Ravishankar. The most commonly researched spiritual practice of Sri Sri ravishankar have been Sudarshan Kriya and Pranayama. Studies have shown that regular practice of Sudarshan Kriya and Pranayama relives anxiety, stress, tension, insomnia and many other psychological disturbances. At physiological level Sudarshan Kriya and Pranayama has shown reduction in blood lactate indicator of relaxation increase in anti oxidant enzymes indicator of better anti oxidant defence increase in natural killer cells indicator of better immune functioning, reduction in the habit of smoking, drinking, alcohol and drug intake, and better rehabilitation of prisoners, Benefits of Sudarshan Kriya and Pranayama have even percolated down to the level of gene expression The independent studies, one from Norway and one from All India Institute of medical sciences New Delhi have demonstrated positive effect of Sudarshan Kriya and Pranayama on gene expression. One of the study has suggested that incidence of cancer and Heart disease is likely to be lower in those who practice Sudarshan Kriya and Pranayama regularly. Sudarshan Kriya and Pranayama is taught to the participants through an Art of Living program called as Happiness program. Art of Living is an International foundation founded by His holiness Sri Sri Ravishankar in early 1980s As many as 60 research papers till date have been published on the benefits of Art of Living programs In conclusion it can be stated that there is sufficient evidence to consider Art of Living programs to be beneficial lowrisk lowcost adjunct to the treatment of stress, anxiety, Post Traumatic Stress Disorder, depression stress related medical illnesses, substance abuse and rehabilitation of criminal offenders programs have been used as public health intervention to alleviate, Post Traumatic Stress Disorder in survivors of mass disasters such as New York Trade Centre 9/11 incidence, South East Asia tsunami earthquakes wars floods etc. Art of Living programs have been shown to enhance wellbeing mood attention mental focus and stress tolerance. Proper training by skilled teacher and a 30 minute practice every day maximises the benefits.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: To see the effect of Shakti kriya (new spritual process) on gene expression. HRV and GSR and quality of life in comparision to Sudarshan Kriya (already a known process)

ngoList.title: YAKSHAGANA KENDRA
ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Yakshagana Kendra situated in Udupi the main belt of Yakshagana Badaguthittu tradition has made manifold contributions to the preservation development. propagation and study of Badaguthittu Yakshagana as a traditional theatre form. Its first and foremost contribution is in respect of offering regular systematic and thorough training in Yakshagana dance music choregoraphy and costuming. A year or two of training and specialization equips the students to perform in the professional theatre on par with the regular artistes. The training tradition was established by the veterans of Yakshagana theatre. Gurus Veerabhadra Nayak dancer Ramakrishnayya bhagawath Gopala Rao maddale and Veerabhadra Nayak was an all rounder. Universally respected as a perfect exponent of Yakshagana. At present Guru Sanjeeva Suvarna have been awarded State Awards by the Govt. of Karnataka. The school is thus able to provide training in authentic Badaguthittu Yakshagana tradition. Over the past 40 years yashagana kendra has contributed nearly 2000 trained and qualified yakshagana artistes to the professional and the amateur theatre. The intensive training required for this expertise has has been possible because of the full time training offered in a Gurukula system in addition school children in the surrounding area are taught yakshagana during week ends thus exposing our younger generation to the tradition. At the same time the Kendra has achieved a creative extension of the tradition by making it evolve a variety of yakshsgana ballet suitable for non kannada and foreign audiences which achieves an accentuation of artistic effect with a separate profeesional ensemble yakshagana it has performed before national and international audiences and made them familiar with the yakshagana theatre. The National school of Drama has recognized yakshagana as one of the major theatre forms in India and has also recognized Yakshagana Kendra as the official exponent of the theatre form and has deputed it on a performance tour to China to represent Indian theatre tradition. Many scholars inclouding foreigners have studied Yakshagana learnt the art themselves and became the exponents of Yakshagana in their own country by inviting our artistes to perform there and by presenting short performances on their own Important names of foreigners are Martha Ashton and Kathrin Binder both of whom wrote research works on the art More than 5phD dissertations have been written by Indian scholars associated with yakshagana Kendra Udupi. The Gurus of Yakshshagana Kendra have actively participated in a programme sponsored by the Karnataka Government of teaching Yakshagana to school children in the High schools of Udupi District Guru Sanjeeva Suvarna a master of teaching Yakshagana dance has offered training even to physically disadvantaged children and enabled them to preset yakshagana on the stage thus instilling in them a sense of self confidence and dignity Guru Sanjeeva Suvarna has held a number of training sessions and work shops in several prts of the state and even in Maharastra and Delhi. The Yakshagana Kendra has its own building with excellent infrastructual faciliteis for training and performances and for board and loding of the trainees.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Yenepoya University is a unitary campus having all its facility like colleges, hospitals, hostels, playground, sports complex, library and hostels in a single location. Yenepoya University is located in an eco-friendly lush green campus with ample opportunity for experiencing the splendor of natural surroundings making it a place highly conducive for learning. The student support facility like hostels, library, play ground, Gymnasium, auditorium, cafeteria etc are spacious and well planned. There are several best practices like, rain water harvesting, establishment of medicinal plant garden, which are unique. Certain attractive academic programs like Post graduate Diploma in Medical Ethics and Clinical Ethics are first of their in this country. A large teaching hospital with 1250 beds giving excellent health care at a absolutely no cost to the patients providing abundant clinical material for student learning. A favored destination for female students and employees because of the safety and security in the campus and zero tolerance for sexual harassment. Extension activities involving rural community providing unique practices like Door to Door Health Care Delivery, Health Care on Wheels and Yen Health Cards covering over a population of 50000. Establishment of specialized center: Center for Ethics, Center for Rural Health Care and Development, Center for Substance abuse prevention, Center for Craniofacial Anomalies and so on actively involved in service, education, research and outreach activates. Establishment of a state of the art Multidisciplinary research center with a facilities for Stem Cell and Regenerative Medicine, Cell Culture, Systems Biology, Molecular Biology, Nano- medicine alike. Establishment of Collaboration for academic and research pursuits with many reputed institution in India and aboard encouraging student and faculty exchange, providing ample opportunity for global exposure. Establishment of Skills and Simulations Center, providing additional clinical training through Mannequins ensuring hands on experience. Establishment of a fully mechanized central kitchen providing hygienic and wholesome diet to students and diet, free of the cost to the latter. Recognition of Minority educational Institution by Government of India. Recruitment and retention of highly qualified, talented an skilled faculty capable of training students through innovative curriculum. Establishment of standalone center for health profession education imparting training in personal and professional development for teachers Starting of E-Learning as a mode of interactive learning and provision for students, interns, and residents to train in Hospital Information system. Opening of a Super Specialty wind of the hospital ensuring comprehensive tertiary health care under one roof. Demonstrated Research output in the form of number of research publications, attraction of extramural research funds and registration of patents by faculty members. Implementation of an efficient solid waste management system, commissioning of a vermicomposting unit and waste water recycling. Implementation of credit system, semester based credit system, OSPE-OSCE, Wi-Fi facility, E-learning, Conduct of online tests, Card system for viva etc.
